title: Privacy Policy
content:
Privacy Policy for Patientli

Effective Date: February 4, 2025

Patientli is committed to protecting the privacy of your information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you visit our website or use our services.   

1. Information Collection:   

We collect the following information from users:

  • Contact Information: Name, email address, phone number (if provided).
  • Business Information: Details about your healthcare practice, such as practice name, number of doctors, website url, services offered, and location. This information is used to tailor our services and marketing efforts to your specific needs.

2. Use of Information:

We use the collected information for the following purposes:

  • Providing Services: To deliver the services you have requested, such as website design, brand design, and marketing services.  
     
  • Marketing: To contact you with information about our services, promotions, and industry news that may be relevant to your business. We may use your business information to personalize these communications.
  • Communication: To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support.
  • Improving Services: To analyze website usage and customer feedback to improve our services and website.

3. Sharing of Information:

We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with the following categories of recipients:   

  • Service Providers: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us with website hosting, data analysis, email marketing, and other services necessary for our business operations. These service providers are contractually obligated to protect your information and only use it for the purposes we specify. 
     
  • Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required by law, court order, or government request.
  • Business Transfers: If Patientli is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of its assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction. You will be notified via email and/or prominent notice on our website of any change in ownership or control of your personal information, as well as any choices you may have regarding your personal information   
     

4. Data Security:

We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. These measures include:   

  • Password Protection: Our website is password-protected. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password.
  • Two-Factor Authentication (2FA): We encourage the use of 2FA for added security.
  • Secure Hosting: We use reputable hosting providers with robust security measures. Patientli partners with Flywheel (getflywheel.com) for hosting. 

While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, while we use reasonable efforts to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.   

 
5. User Rights:

You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

  • Access: You can request access to the personal information we hold about you.
  • Deletion: You can request that we delete your personal information.
  • Correction: You can request that we correct any inaccuracies in your personal information.

To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@patient.li. We will respond to your request within 7 days.

6. Cookies:

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your activity on our website. These technologies help us analyze website traffic, personalize your experience, and improve our services.

You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

7. Children's Privacy:

Our website and services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.   

8. Changes to this Privacy Policy:   

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post the updated policy on this website with a revised effective date. Your continued use of our website or services after the posting of the updated policy constitutes your acceptance of the revised policy.   

9. Contact Us:

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@patient.li.

title: Home
content:
Be found, stand out and attract your best patients with Patientli.

We’re a new kind of dental marketing service that’s been thoughtfully designed from the ground up to serve the all of the marketing needs of growing practices. Our stunning designs and researched-backed marketing approaches help generate results for growth-minded dental businesses of all sizes.

Pick your look

First impressions matter to today’s patients. We arm dental businesses with modern, polished brands that command attention and build loyalty. Browse our Looks and pick or make tweaks to one you love. 

Pick your layouts

Choose from a variety of website layouts designed for dentists and informed by data. A beautiful and helpful website is the the foundation for ranking on Google, gaining new patients and increasing care acceptance. Learn more.

Pick your plan

From search results to reviews sites, social media and ads, our services are designed to help your businesses become the clear, visible choice for patients at each step of their journey to care.

Find your practice’s new Look today.

Patientli Looks are a shortcut to world-class branding for dental practices. Designs for logos, websites, marketing materials and much more. Find your look

Great design. Better results.

Explore how practices like yours have achieved better visibility and reached their new patient goals with Patientli.

Need more info? Keep learning with these free resources:

Our best working relationships happen when our clients are informed and empowered partners in their marketing strategies. We’ve created these free resources to earn your business and your trust.

title: Refund and Returns Policy
content:
Patientli Return and Refund Policies

1. Business Information:

  • Business Name: Patientli
  • Goods and Services Offered: Patientli provides brand design, website design, and marketing services for healthcare practices.

2. Customer Service Contact Details:

  • Email: support@patient.li

3. Refund and Dispute Policy:

We strive to provide high-quality services that exceeds customer expectations. In the event that you are dissatisfied with our services, please contact us at support@patient.li within 14 days of receiving the service to discuss your concerns. We will work with you to address the issue, which may include revisions, adjustments, or, at our discretion, a partial or full refund. All refunds are evaluated on a case-by-case basis. Disputes will be handled fairly and efficiently. We encourage open communication and aim to leave every customer 100% satisfied with our services or resolution of their concerns.

4. Cancellation Policy:

Patientli subscriptions are billed monthly. Customers can cancel their subscription at any time by contacting us at support@patient.li. Upon cancellation, services will continue to be rendered, and the customer's website will be hosted until the end of the current billing cycle. After the current billing cycle, the customer's website and information will be deleted, and all services will cease. Prorated refunds for partial months are at Patientli's sole discretion and will be considered in situations where services do not meet the customer's reasonable standards.

title: Pricing
content:
Choose a Patientli plan that works for you.

Whether you’re just starting out or taking over the town, we’ve got a plan that will fit your needs. Patientli plans are designed to grow with you. No long commitments, upgrade or downgrade anytime.

All plans include:

Clear & transparent results reporting No long commitments Website + branding Access to our small, awesome team Patientli’s research-based approach

title: Partners
content:
Help your clients grow, earn a generous commission in the process. That’s a win-win.

Become a Patientli partner to earn commissions for helping your clients, connections or friends attract new patients. It’s free and easy to get started.

Earn $750-$3,000 per referral

No cap on commissions

Become a partner

How it works:

With resources that help you spread the word however it suits your style and a program without fine-print, we aim to have the simplest, fairest and most straightforward referral program in the industry.

Make a connection

Connect us with practices in your network who need marketing, website or branding support. Spread the word any way you like-- via email, social, your own reports, or old fashioned word of mouth.

Earn a commission

If your connection signs up for a Patientli plan, we’ll pay you a commission equal to one month of their selected plan, ranging from $750-$3,000. We deposit commissions after your connection maintains a subscription for 90 days.

Get free resources, support & perks to help

We make it easy for partners to start the conversation about Patientli with templated emails, social posts and marketing reports to include in recommendations or conversation.

Become a partner today to receive your referral link and welcome package with conversation starters.

Sign up now

Easy, authentic ways for consultants, brokers and fellow doctors to recommend Patientli:

Know a practice who needs to boost their production but not quite sure how to help them get there? We strive to be the marketing partner you can feel confident about recommending to close the gap. Patientli aims to make it easy for you to recommend us with free templates and conversation starters.

Introduce us directly to practices who need marketing help

Send an email to introduce us and we’ll handle the rest. We’ll keep you in the loop if your connection books a demo and send you a commission when they subscribe to a plan. We even provide draft emails you can use as conversation starters.

Include us in your recommendations

Do you provide a report of recommendations or preferred vendors to your clients as a part of your services? Mention Patientli in your marketing recommendations! Pair with a free marketing analysis to increase the usefulness of your deliverables.

Request marketing reports

Want to provide a practice with specific digital marketing suggestions & metrics about their website and SEO performance? Request a free marketing analysis you can share to help your clients understand their current online visibility and identify specific actions for improvement.

Share social content with a referral link to earn passively

We provide partners with unique referral links and social content they can repost to establish themselves as healthcare marketing thought leaders. When someone in your network clicks your link and goes on to subscribe to a Patient plan, we’ll process your commission automatically for making the connection.

Sign up to start earning today

title: Terms of Use
content:
Terms of Service for Patientli

1. Use of Website:

Welcome to Patientli's website. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. This website is intended to provide information about Patientli's services, including brand design, website design, and marketing services for healthcare practices. You may use this website for lawful purposes only and in accordance with these terms.

2. Use of Patientli's Services and Client Content:

Patientli provides website design and marketing services to healthcare practices. Our website themes and designs are the intellectual property of Patientli. Clients who subscribe to our services are granted a non-exclusive, revocable license to use the designed website for their own marketing purposes for the duration of their active subscription. Upon termination of the subscription, the license to use the website design is revoked, and the website may be taken down.

All content provided by the client for use in their website (e.g., text, images, logos) remains the property of the client. However, the design and structure of the website itself, including the layout, templates, and underlying code, remain the exclusive property of Patientli.

3. Intellectual Property:

All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Patientli or its licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, modify, distribute, or display any content from this website without our prior written consent.   

As mentioned above, the website designs created for clients are the intellectual property of Patientli and are licensed to the client for use during their active subscription period.

4. Disclaimers:

Patientli provides its services "as is" and without any warranty of any kind, express or implied. We do not warrant that our website or services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or that any results will be achieved. We disclaim all liability for any damages arising from the use of our website or services.   

5. Limitation of Liability:

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Patientli shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to lost profits, data loss, or business interruption, arising out of or in connection with the use of our website or services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Our total liability to you for any claim arising out of or in connection with these terms or our services shall not exceed the amount you have paid us for the services in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.   

6. Governing Law:

These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Washington, without regard to its conflict of law principles.   

7. Changes to Terms:   

Patientli reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will post the updated terms on this website, and the revised terms will be effective upon posting. Your continued use of our website or services after the posting of revised terms constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms.   

8. Entire Agreement:

These Terms of Service constitute the entire agreement between you and Patientli regarding the use of our website and services and supersede any prior agreements or understandings.

title: Partner Program Agreement
content:
Effective Date: March 31, 2025 This Agreement is made between Patientli, LLC, a Washington limited liability company ("Patientli"), and the individual or entity participating in the Patientli Partner Program ("Partner"). By participating in the program, the Partner agrees to the following terms:

1. Purpose of the Agreement

This Agreement outlines the terms under which the Partner may refer potential clients to Patientli in exchange for referral compensation.

2. Referral Compensation

Patientli agrees to pay the Partner a one-time referral fee equivalent to one month's subscription amount of the plan selected by the referred client. Amounts are as follows:
  • Basic Plan: one payment of $750
  • Starter Plan: one payment of $1,750
  • Growth Plan: one payment of $3,000
Referral compensation is payable provided that:
  • The referred client signs up using the Partner’s unique referral link, after direct written introduction to a representative of Patientli, or is otherwise clearly tracked to the Partner.
  • The referred client remains continuously subscribed and pays in full for at least 90 days.
  • The referral is not already in Patientli’s system as an active lead or existing client.
  • Referral payments will be issued within 30 days after the 90-day period is complete.

3. Independent Relationship

The Partner is an independent party. This Agreement does not create a joint venture, agency, employment, or partnership between the Partner and Patientli. The Partner may not make statements or commitments on behalf of Patientli.

4. Use of Brand and Materials

Patientli grants the Partner a limited, non-exclusive right to use Patientli branding, logos, and marketing materials for the purpose of promoting Patientli’s services, in accordance with its brand guidelines.

5. Term and Termination

This Agreement remains effective until terminated by either party in writing. Either party may terminate the Agreement at any time, with or without cause, by providing written notice. Referral fees for eligible referrals made prior to termination will still be honored per Section 2.

6. Confidentiality

Both parties agree to keep confidential any non-public information shared in connection with this Agreement.

7. Restrictions

  • You may not refer yourself or your own business
  • You may not use misleading or unethical marketing practices to promote your Referral Link or Patientli’s services
  • You may not use Patientli’s name, logo, or other trademarks without our prior written consent, except as expressly permitted in connection with the Program
  • You are responsible for all taxes associated with the commissions you earn.

8. Limitation of Liability

Patientli is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages related to this Agreement. Total liability shall not exceed the total referral fees paid to the Partner.

9. Governing Law

This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Washington.

10. Modification

Patientli reserves the right to modify this Agreement at any time. We will notify partners of changes and post the updated Agreement on our website. The revised terms will become effective upon posting. Continued participation in the Program constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

11. Contact

If you have any questions about this Agreement or the Program, please contact us at partners@patient.li.

12. Acceptance

By joining the Patientli Partner Program, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to this Agreement.

title: Thank You - Resource - Treatment Plan
content:
CHECK EMAIL FOR YOUR RESOURCE

Sending better treatment proposals isn’t the only way you can boost the value of your patient base.

Top-performing practices know that large cases are won and lost on patient trust. Patientli’s marketing solutions help practices leverage their websites to educate, inform and empower their patient base -- helping more patients build the trust and confidence needed to accept your treatment recommendations, even after they’ve left the office.

83%

of millennial patients validate treatment recommendations with their own research

77%

of patients use internet search to find information prior to booking an appointment HOW IT WORKS

Give patients the information they need. Boost treatment acceptance in your sleep.

In today’s digital world, patients are now active partners in their medical journeys. And partnership requires a lot of trust to be built before, during and after the appointment. If you’re relying on the in-person care experience alone, you’re missing out on 2 of the 3 opportunities to achieve treatment acceptance. 

1/3: BEFORE THE APPOINTMENT

Today’s patients seek lots of information before ever walking into the office, researching symptoms and conditions, reading reviews, provider bios, case studies and more. The practice’s website must facilitate this process.

How Patientli helps: We provide your practice with a library of medically-sound website posts about each service your practice offers, helping patients to feel like they’re coming to their appointment informed, empowered and ready to make decisions.

2/3: DURING THE APPOINTMENT

Human connection puts it all together. This is the doctor’s time to shine. Providing consistent and personalized information helps to cement trust. The feel of the care experience and environment play a strong supporting role.

How Patientli helps: We provide your practice with branded materials and resources that reinforce professionalism and enabling providers to spend less appointment time on basic education and more time on building connection, clarity and trust.

3/3: AFTER THE APPOINTMENT

Website content and strong treatment proposals can help to overcome barriers and cold feet, addressing common logistical issues and concerns that they forgot or didn’t want to ask about in-person.

How Patientli helps: From recovery instructions, to affordability tactics and relatable patient stories, Patientli provides your practice with content that makes it easy to give patients the peace of mind they need to accept your care plans, all informed by Google search data on common post-appointment questions.

Learn about the many ways Patientli can help your practice grow.

Get a demo See pricing & plans WHAT WE DO

Patientli is an all-in-one marketing service for growing practices.

Whether you’re just starting out, seeking to grow your patient base, or looking to get more value out of your practice, Patientli is here to help. We’re a new kind of marketing service that’s been thoughtfully designed to help practices grow by serving the needs of patients across their whole journey to care. Our stunning designs and researched-backed marketing approaches help generate results for growth-minded healthcare businesses of all sizes. 

Choose a new or enhanced brand aesthetic

First impressions matter to today’s patients. We arm dental businesses with modern, polished brands that command attention and build loyalty. Browse our available brand kits.

Launch or upgrade your website

Attract and educate patients with a beautiful and helpful website, the foundation for ranking on Google, gaining new patients and increasing care acceptance. Learn more.

Power your growth with a marketing plan

From search results to reviews sites, social media and ads, our services are designed to help your businesses become the clear, visible choice for patients at each step of their journey to care.

Get a free demo to learn how Patentli can help your practice grow or maximize your patient base.

title: Website Offer Var A (one time payment option only)
content:
Attract more patients with a new high-performing website

We built beautiful, affordable and high-converting websites for dental practices in 14 days or less. Start getting discovered online and bringing in more patients today. Schedule a call Sites from $5k Launched fast 100% done for you

Turn your practice’s website into a patient-attraction machine.

Stop losing out on patients to practices with better websites and marketing strategies. Here’s how Patientli helps you stand out from the competition.

100% Done For You

Unlike competitors, we don’t make you manage add your own content to your website. Our stress free process has helped practices all over the country get a website they’re proud of without the hassle.

Get Discovered on Google

All of our sites come with a free initial SEO optimization and a free SEO consultation. Your new SEO-optimized website will get discovered by potential patients searching for your products or services on Google. Outrank your competitors today!

Turn Visitors Into Patients

From search results to reviews sites, social media and ads, our services are designed to help your businesses become the clear, visible choice for patients at each step of their journey to care.

Everything you need to grow your practice on the internet.

Patientli is more than just a web design studio. We are business owners who understand what you need to grow your practice.

Launch in 14 days or less

We make the website building process simple. Our streamlined process has helped practices across the country launch their website & get customers FASTER.

Award winning design

Stand out from the crowd (and blow away your competition) with our proven designs built specifically to help you convert more visitors into lifelong patients.

Integrates with your software

We integrate with all major platforms in dentistry. Whether you’re looking to integrate your forms, patient management systems or more, we’ve got you covered.

Pre-installed analytics

You should know exactly what's going on with your website at all times, so we pre-install all your required tracking & analytics tools so you are always in the loop.

Complete blog system

Creating content to rank on Google has never been easier with our out-of-the-box content management system. We can even write the articles for you!

Free marketing plan

CopyaGet an in-depth strategic plan for your SEO and PPC campaigns so you can maximize the traffic coming to your new website.

Turn your practice’s website into a patient-attraction machine.

Stop losing out on patients to practices with better websites and marketing strategies. Here’s how Patientli helps you stand out from the competition.

Victor Lee, Prosthodontist

“Patientli has done great things for our practice. I love that we can depend on a steady flow of new patients from our online marketing campaigns and rely on a partner who’s proactive about identifying and executing on new opportunities for our growth.”

Virginia Moore, Past President ADMC

“I think one of the biggest benefits Patientli offers to dentists is the ability to take care of website development, dental SEO and marketing all under one roof. If you are tired of “cookie-cutter” looks like every other dental website, then you are ready for what Patientli will bring you…the type of online visibility that will benefit your practice with the right patients for your care.”

Jody Arrowsmith, Practice Manager

“I am thrilled to recommend Patientli. They have been incredible to work with on our website and SEO and have always produced excellent results. Justin is extremely knowledgeable and somehow can translate my “ideas” into a functional works of art that always turn out better than I imagined. They are super professional and fun to work with.”

Anthony Grados, General Dentist

"I started working with Patientli after having a poor experience with another company. They've been amazing to work with and a complete "180" from my experience with the other company. Our SEO has steadily improved and is getting us where we hope to be with our business. I can only provide my highest recommendation for Patientli, as they've been a pleasure to work with and provided outstanding results. "

Steve Ikemiya, General Dentist

"I've recently taken a more active role in our group's marketing efforts and have genuinely enjoyed working with Patientli on our website and email campaigns. They're very insightful, naturally collaborative and dependable. They always do what they say they will do, and for me that's the best form of marketing you can provide."

Tyler Dunbar, Practice Manager

Outstanding website management from Justin and his team at Patientli. He's proactive, responsive, and makes complex issues simple. Highly recommend his expertise!

Get a top-quality site at an affordable price.

Patientli is more than just a web design studio. We are business owners who understand what you need to grow your practice.

Get everything you need to grow your practice with an awesome new website today.

  • Home Page
  • About Page

title: Thank You - Resource - AI Knowledge Snapshot
content:
Learn how Patientli can help you attract your best patients in an AI-first world.

Top-performing practices are already adapting to a world where patients begin their healthcare search inside ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini. In this world, the practices that win attention (and new patients) are the ones who intentionally structure their website and content to teach AI systems who they are, what they do, and when to recommend them.

Our AEO service helps your practice become the trusted answer these models surface — so patients discover you earlier, more often, and with more trust.

How It Works

We give AI the information it needs so it can match you with more of your ideal patients.

Patients don’t browse AI tools the way they browse Google. They ask questions. They describe symptoms. They share their very unique preferences and needs. Winning visibility requires your website to supply the exact signals AI models rely on to understand expertise, services, and relevance.

Below are the three core elements of the modern patient’s AI-driven search — and how Patientli helps your practice shine.

Clear Expertise Signals

Patients ask AI tools who is qualified, trustworthy, and experienced.

If your website doesn’t articulate what makes you an expert, AI tools may default to generic answers or competitors whose content is easier to interpret.

How Patientli helps: We structure your website pages and bio content to highlight clinical expertise, unique differentiators, case outcomes, and patient-ready explanations — all in formats that AI models can understand, rank, and reuse when recommending local providers.

Comprehensive Service Clarity

Patients ask AI tools for specific services and who offers them.

AI tools need to see clear definitions of your services, conditions treated, approaches, candidacy criteria, and treatment pathways in order to recommend you for relevant queries.

How Patientli helps: We turn your website into an AI-ready knowledge hub, ensuring each service you offer is documented with medically-sound, structured content that teaches AI models when your practice is the right answer.

Core Differentiators

Patients ask AI tools about their personal needs and preferences.

When patients explain why they chose a practice, it’s often because of details that are hard to type into a traditional search: the feel of the office, insurance acceptance, appointment availability, convenience, or a sense of fit.

How Patientli helps: We identify the key qualities that help your practice win — then translate them into clear, structured signals that AI models can understand. This makes it easier for AI engines to recommend your practice for the reasons patients actually care about.

What We Do

Patientli’s AEO Service Helps Practices Thrive in an AI-Search World.

Whether you’re just starting to explore AI search or ready to overhaul your online clarity, Patientli gives you the strategy, content, and technical setup needed to become the obvious answer when patients ask AI tools for help. Best of all, we do it all for you, freeing your time to provide excellent care.

Optimize your current website for AI search. Or start fresh with one of ours.

If your website needs more than light optimization, Patientli can supply a stunning, professionally branded site that’s fully optimized for AI search — all at an affordable price. Our websites are built to impress patients and clearly teach AI tools who you are, helping you start strong with an AEO-ready foundation.

Define your ideal patient and start creating content just for them.

We work with you to identify your highest-value patient types, then build educational, medically-sound content around their needs, questions, and decision triggers — making it easier for AI tools to match the right patients to your practice.

Supplement your AI visibility with a comprehensive marketing plan

AEO is powerful on its own, but practices grow fastest when AI visibility is supported by strong web design, SEO, reviews, ads, and local presence. Patientli’s all-in-one marketing plans help amplify your visibility across every channel, ensuring you’re the clear, trusted choice wherever patients start their search.
